Detailed Description

Header file used in PacketDistributor functionality to register End points and get the informsation about the end points.

N_PacketDistributor.h

Definition in file N_PacketDistributor.h.

Function Documentation

END_PACK void N_PacketDistributor_RegisterEndpoint ( const N_PacketDistributor_SimpleDescriptor_t *  simpleDesc,
uint8_t  groupCount 
)

Register a ZigBee end-point.

Parameters:
N_PacketDistributor_SimpleDescriptor_tPointer to a filled structure describing the end-point. The memory must stay available after the call to this function
groupCountThe number of groups used by the the endpoint (see the note below)
Note:
The groups count should include number of the groups that the endpoint uses as client of the ZCL groups cluster, NOT the number of groups used as server of the cluster: e.g. a remote control endpoint uses one group (groupCount == 1) to control some dimmable light endpoints (groupCount == 0).
uint8_t N_PacketDistributor_GetNumberOfZclEndpoints ( void  )

Returns the number of Zcl EndPoints (so excluding ZDO and InterPan endpoints)

uint8_t N_PacketDistributor_GetZclEndpointFromIndex ( uint8_t  index)

Returns the zcl endpoint number for an index (0..NumberOfZclEndpoints-1)

uint8_t N_PacketDistributor_GetGroupCount ( uint8_t  endpoint)

Get the group count registered with N_PacketDistributor_RegisterEndpoint.

Parameters:
endpointThe endpoint number for which to get the group count
Returns:
The group count
uint8_t N_PacketDistributor_GetTotalGroupCount ( void  )

Get the sum of the group counts registered with N_PacketDistributor_RegisterEndpoint for all endpoints.

Returns:
The total number of groups
uint8_t N_PacketDistributor_GetNumberOfZllEndpoints ( void  )

Returns the number of Zll EndPoints

uint8_t N_PacketDistributor_GetZllEndpointFromIndex ( uint8_t  index)

Returns the zll endpoint number for an index (0..NumberOfZllEndpoints-1)

uint8_t N_PacketDistributor_GetTotalGroupCountZll ( void  )

Get the sum of the group counts registered with N_PacketDistributor_RegisterEndpoint for all endpoints.

Returns:
The total number of groups
N_PacketDistributor_SimpleDescriptor_t* N_PacketDistributor_FindEndpoint ( uint8_t  endpoint)

Find a registered endpoint.

Parameters:
endpointEndpoint number
Returns:
A pointer to the endpoint description or NULL if the endpoint could not be found. Do not free the memory
bool N_PacketDistributor_IsInterPan ( uint16_t  panId,
uint8_t  endpoint 
)

Check if the received message is received Inter-PAN.

Parameters:
panIdThe pan id from the source address
endpointThe endpoint from the source address
Returns:
TRUE if it is an Inter-PAN message, FALSE otherwise

const N_Zcl_DataInd_Callback_t *  pCallback
